Collaborative.Title: Trello lets you work more collaboratively and get more done.
Collaborative.Text: Trello’s boards, lists, and cards enable you to organize and prioritize your projects in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.

WorkWithTeam.Title: Work with any team
WorkWithTeam.Text: Whether it’s for work, a side project or even the next family vacation, Trello helps your team stay organized.

Information.Title: Information at a glance
Information.Text: Dive into the details by adding comments, attachments, due dates, and more directly to Trello cards. Collaborate on projects from beginning to end.

WorkFlow.Title: Built-In Workflow Automation With Butler
WorkFlow.Text: Let the robots do the work! Boost productivity by unleashing the power of automation across your entire team with Butler, and remove tedious tasks from your to-do lists with:

TrelloWays.Title: Trello your way
TrelloWays.Text: Use Trello the way your team works best. We’ve got the flexibility & features to fit any team’s style.

Contents.caption: It’s easy to get your team up and running with Trello. We’ve collected all of the boards and tools you need to succeed in one handy resource.
Integrate the apps your team already uses directly into your workflow. Power-Ups turn Trello boards into living applications to meet your team's unique business needs.
No matter where you are, Trello stays in sync across all of your devices. Collaborate with your team anywhere, from sitting on the bus to sitting on the beach.

PlaningToday.Title: Start Planing Today
PlaningToday.Text: Sign up and become one of the millions of people around the world using Trello to get more done.
